message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $95?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I still need to make a profit. I can offer you a slight discount, but I need $105 for the product. Can you meet me there?
I'm still a bit short of my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway on the discount. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $100?
